summary:
It’s your world. Live More in your own way.

This is the message and value that NetEase and VNG want to introduce to our players. After 4 years of research & development, we want to introduce Revelation as a companion for players in their years of youth, a "haven" where players can relax and de-stress after a long day. In addition to amazing visuals & graphics, Revelation highly values the feeling of being your true self, to embark on any adventure in a vast world beyond the horizon of the sky and sea. Come to Revelation and explore the world with many unique features & experiences that we proudly believe “only Revelation” can provide.
